activities: Myriad processes personal information received in conjunction with genetic laboratory tests ordered by health care providers.   Personal information is limited to that which is required to run testing.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: The personal data processed includes demographic data and personal health information for individual patients in electronic and manual formats.
recoursemech: Myriad has committed to cooperate with the applicable EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) to resolve disputes.
